actions.subcommittee: Domestic Monetary Policy, Technology and Economic Growth
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Domestic Monetary Policy, Technology and Economic Growth.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Domestic Monetary Policy, Technology, and Economic Growth

official_title: To abolish the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System and the Federal reserve banks, to repeal the Federal Reserve Act, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Federal Reserve Board Abolition Act - Abolishes the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System and each Federal reserve bank.Repeals the Federal Reserve Act.Instructs the Chairman of the Board to wind up its affairs and those of the Federal reserve banks.Instructs the Director of the Office of Management and Budget to liquidate all assets of the Board and of the Federal reserve banks.

titles.title: To abolish the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System and the Federal reserve banks, to repeal the Federal Reserve Act, and for other purposes.
